description: The Seagate®Momentus®2.5-inch drive is the world's most feature-rich 2.5-inch drive for laptops and external enclosures. Momentus drives deliver solutions and customer confidence with options in speed and capacity, and innovative features such as Self-Encrypting Drives and drop sensor technology. Choose from six capacities: 750, 640, 500, 320, 250 and 160GB; two performance speeds: 7200 RPM and 5400 RPM; and three innovative features: Self-Encrypting Drives, FIPS 140-2 certification (in process) and free-fall drop sensor. Momentus drives give you the power to transform from ordinary to extraordinary.
title: Seagate Momentus 7200 500GB 7200RPM SATA 3Gb/s 16MB Cache 2.5 Inch Internal NB Hard Drive ST9500420AS-Bare Drive
